ch.codebulb.crudlet.model

Class CrudEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.codebulb.crudlet.model.CrudEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CrudIdentifiable, Serializable

    @MappedSuperclass
public abstract class CrudEntity
extends Object
implements CrudIdentifiable

    An abstract generic base class for a persistent business entity (model).

    Use either the CrudIdentifiable interface or the CrudEntity class to derive your entity model classes from. This is the only prerequisite to use them with a CrudService and a CrudResource.

    The difference between the interface and the class is that the latter provides an auto-generated Long id field implementation out-of-the-box.

    As an example, a Customer entity can be created by deriving from CrudEntity like so:

    @Entity
public class Customer extends CrudEntity { 
    @NotNull
    @Pattern(regexp = "[A-Za-z ]*")
    private String name;
    private String address;
    private String city;
    ...
}

    Apart from the @Entity annotation, this class consists solely of business logic.

    See Also:
